pe6:16.2: acchadanaṃ → avacchanaṃ (bj); avacchadanaṃ (pts-vp-pli1); avecchadanaṃ (mr) | apasacchāgamanaṃ → apasaṭṭhāgamanaṃ (bj)
pe6:51.5: āsappanā → appanā (pts-vp-pli1, mr) | adhiṭṭhāgamanaṃ → anadiṭṭhānaṃ (bj); aniṭṭhāgamanaṃ (mr)
pe6:58.2: sammadaññāvimutto → katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho (si), sampajañño vimutto (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pe6:72.2: gatapaṭṭho → vigataṭṭho (bj); appaṭṭho (pts-vp-pli1) | vivaṭṭaṭṭho → vivattaṭṭho suññaṭṭho (bj)
